event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: To request the Solaris Service Manager to start the service, run svcadm enable service_fmri. To see its state, run svcs service_fmri.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: The service is disabled. It is not running and will not be started.
event_registry_properties.name: details
impact
event_registry_properties.item: The service is not running. It will remain in the disabled state until it is enabled (for example, with svcadm enable -t). Services with require-type dependencies on it will not be started. (Use svcs -xv service_fmri to see a list of services waiting for the service to start.)
event_registry_properties.name: title
